mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id, c.product_id, c.quantity, p.id as p_id, p.name as p_name, p.description as p_description, p.price as p_price, p.stock as p_stock, p.sales as p_sales, p.status as p_status, p.image as p_image FROM carts c LEFT JOIN products p ON c.product_id = p.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1
SELECT * FROM carts WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE carts SET quantity = #{quantity} WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM carts WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
